text: Pasquale Berardi (born 3 January 1983 in Carbonara, Italy) is an Italian footballer. He plays as a midfielder. He is currently playing for Italian Serie D team Sulmona. ==External links== *Profile at lega-calcio.it Category:Living people Category:1983 births Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie B players Category:S.S.C. title: Pasquale Berardi
